org.dockbox.selene.api

Interface ThreadUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpongeThreadUtils

    public interface ThreadUtils
    A low-level interface for easy thread-based actions. For all cases this should only be accessed through InjectableBootstrap.getInstance(Class, InjectorProperty[])}.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Exceptional<T> awaitAsync(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
      Performs a given Runnable on a async thread, and blocks the current thread until it completes.
      <T> Exceptional<T> awaitSync(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
      Performs a given Runnable on a sync thread, and blocks the current thread until it completes.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<?> performAsync(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Performs a given Runnable on a async thread, returning a Future object to be used for completion checks.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<?> performSync(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Performs a given Runnable on a sync thread, returning a Future object to be used for completion checks.

    • Method Detail

      • performAsync

        java.util.concurrent.Future<?> performAsync(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Performs a given Runnable on a async thread, returning a Future object to be used for completion checks. The threads are usually provided by the underlying platform.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The Runnable to run
        Returns:
        The Future object for completion checks

      • performSync

        java.util.concurrent.Future<?> performSync(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Performs a given Runnable on a sync thread, returning a Future object to be used for completion checks. The threads are usually provided by the underlying platform.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The Runnable to run
        Returns:
        The Future object for completion checks

      • awaitAsync

        <T> Exceptional<T> awaitAsync(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
        Performs a given Runnable on a async thread, and blocks the current thread until it completes. The threads are usually provided by the underlying platform.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type of the callabe
        Parameters:
        callable - The callable to use
        Returns:
        The Exceptional holding either the return value or a Exception

      • awaitSync

        <T> Exceptional<T> awaitSync(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
        Performs a given Runnable on a sync thread, and blocks the current thread until it completes. The threads are usually provided by the underlying platform.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type of the callabe
        Parameters:
        callable - The callable to use
        Returns:
        The Exceptional holding either the return value or a Exception
